subcat1.name: Sales center, brand education, merchandising, disribution agreement, SBT, & HHC

tasks.task1: Introduce to sales center associates and leaders
tasks.task2: Tour sales center, discuss safety & operational protocols
tasks.task4: Order welcome kit, provide order information for additional shirts
tasks.task5: Provide samples of core products the NEW IBP will be selling
tasks.task8: Review Article 4 & 6 (Sale of Product & Distributor Obligations)
tasks.task10: Request ION access for route the NEW IBP is purchasing

tasks.task2: Promotional Calendars - where located, how to read & leverage for selling
tasks.task3: Market Tour, walk the Golden Path looking for opportunities
tasks.task4: Market Tour, discuss DSDE merchandising & the why's
tasks.task5: Market Tour, relate merchandising standards to in-store display
tasks.task6: Market Tour, how displays impact ordering

tasks.task1: Check if HHC communicated & verify sales date, incorrect call 1-855-218-1613
tasks.task2: How to Sync Printer to HHC (show at least once)
tasks.task3: Get & Read Load Invoice from sales center
tasks.task4: Check in returns following sales center guidelines, (stack in order printed)
tasks.task5: Compare load invoice quantities vs physical product
tasks.task8: Print stop distribution report and explain how to read
tasks.task9: Stage trays & dollies to build load out by customer
tasks.task11: Build new load: New IBP call out items and check off skus from the Stop Distribution Report (so they become familiar with abbreviations)
tasks.task12: Make load adjustments in HHC for any damages
tasks.task13: Tag completed stacks with customer name and number
tasks.task14: Submit load invoice for adjustment credit to sales center per local guidelines
tasks.task16: Load stacks/boxes on vehicle in reverse route order
tasks.task18: Stack and return empty trays to correct location in sales center
tasks.task19: Pick up adjusted load invoice and verify correct (manned locations)
tasks.task20: Check for HHC, printer, empty trays and dollies, printer paper, stickers, and displays before leaving
tasks.task21: Once you have left the sales center, the invoice on record is what is charged to the IBP that day

tasks.task3: Invoicing in HHC (both deliveries and returns). Keep signed copy.
tasks.task5: Pull returns set aside (unless account requires scan out before new product brought in)
tasks.task6: Access inventory count function in HHC (on Monday)
tasks.task7: Complete SBT inventory (on Monday), print and keep with paperwork
tasks.task12: Correct signs, stickers, tails tucked, muffins broadsided, wide pans and bagels stood up
tasks.task13: How to read POG (plan-o-gram) for each account
tasks.task14: How to read shelf tag for each account

tasks.task2: Check in returns following sales center guidelines (stack in order printed)
tasks.task3: Finalize and transfer returns in HHC
How to order and when to adjust
tasks.task5: Explain order windows and product lead times
tasks.task8: In the Future (Set up NEW IBP access to ION simulation)
tasks.task10: When it is delivered, how to access it, Analyst contact information
tasks.task11: Supply NEW IBP information Settlement 101 webinar

subcat1.name: AM or Start of Day Process (Sales Center)

tasks.task1: NEW IBP complete all steps in-store process
tasks.task2: NEW IBP complete SBT inventory (on Monday)
tasks.task3: Ensure selling IBP is present for SBT counts or validate counts are correct for company route
tasks.task4: Set up safe carry over for stores
tasks.task7: Introduce IBP to store manager (decision makers)
tasks.task8: NEW IBP fact-based sell to gain support

subcat3.name: PM or End of Day Process

tasks.task1: NEW IBP complete End of Day process
tasks.task2: NEW IBP communicate HHC and set up for HOME wifi
